concept.shortdesc: The deprecated nbspentity is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the #160 entity.

conbody.p: The nbspentity was deprecated in DITA 1.2. The entity was available for use in topics and specializations of topics.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the nbspentity is used in DITA 1.x releases.
section.codeblock: When using Feline Greenies pill pockets, you might need to keep them secured in order to prevent your cat from absconding with the delicious morsels. A mason jar with a tight lid will work well.

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the nbspentity can be replaced by the #160 entity in DITA 2.0.
